msbt.message: I love checking out everyone's houses OK, yeahthat sounds kinda nosy.But seriously, there just isn't a better way to know someone than seeing 'em in their natural habitat!

<20_2 arg="10" />Hey, nice! You sleep on ?<20_2 arg="9" /> You know your stuff!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Whew. Sorry about that. Beds just make me sleepy. I guess that's kinda the point though, .

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Can you believe we still get TV signals all the way out here? Kinda awesome, right?<20_3 arg="6" />So what kind of shows do you like? <20_3 arg="3" />C'mon, , you can tell your pal .

<20_2 arg="10" />?<20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" />I didn't know you were so serious about your music, !<20_3 arg="3" />Got anything with a good beat? Or a wicked guitar solo? C'mon! Play something we can rock out to!
<20_2 arg="10" />, eh Oh, slugs!<20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" />Sorry, I try really hard NOT to know what time it is. <20_3 arg="3" />Kinda tough to do with a clock in front of you.
<20_2 arg="10" />Nice!<20_2 arg="9" /> I love your .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's always good to keep some greenery around, . It really brightens a room, y'know?
<20_2 arg="10" />Whoa! Nice tub!<20_2 arg="9" /> <20_3 arg="6" />I heard you can tell a lot about someone by their bathtub<20_3 arg="3" /> Not sure how that works.

<20_2 arg="10" />Your ? <20_2 arg="9" />Awesome, !<20_3 arg="6" />But do you know what'd be even MORE awesome? <20_3 arg="3" />Two of 'em!It's hard to have too many, y'know? I meanyou still gotta be able to move, butyou know what I mean!

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" /> is so you, !<20_3 arg="6" />I hate chair shopping.<20_3 arg="3" /> You get 20 minutes to guess which chair will be comfy after being in it all day. Ugh.Sorry. I think I'm just jealous you found one you like, .
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />So do you actually know how to play ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I tried to learn a few times. I even took lessons, ! It just never clicked for me
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Hey, where'd you get your ?<20_3 arg="6" />Cooking at home rocks. <20_3 arg="3" />You just can't beat making food EXACTLY how you like it, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? Very cool, .<20_3 arg="6" />I oughta take a page from your book.<20_3 arg="3" /> Can you imagine me with giant, buff arms? That'd rock!
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I see you got yourself . That rocks!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I didn't peg you for the outdoorsy type, but it looks like you know your stuff, !

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Cool !Good lighting can make life so much easier, .<20_3 arg="6" />Like, did you know if you light things just right, <20_3 arg="3" />you can leave your laundry wherever and no one will find out?Uh Don't ask me how I know that.
<20_2 arg="10" />OK, wow! <20_3 arg="6" />Check out your super- sweet !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />No wonder you always look like a rock star, !
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Look at you with your totally rad !<20_3 arg="6" />I gotta admit, some days I can't wait to see what you're wearin'.<20_3 arg="3" /> You've got some wild taste, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I can tell you're taking good care of your .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, just look at how happy that thing is. I had no idea those could even flash a grin, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm totally loving how chill your looks.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's just swaying around in there, not a care in the world. Feels like we could all learn something from it.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wow! I'm seriously digging your !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I didn't know you were so deep into paleontology.<10_4 /> Oh! No pun intend— Hold up. Pun intended, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, wow! I'm really loving the vibe of your .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Like, I'm getting hyped just looking at it. Or that's my coffee kicking in, . Or both! Bwa ha ha!
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Ha! I shoulda figured you'd have .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't know what it is, but there's just something about it that screams , .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, don't be madbut I think your is fake.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Not that it matters. Who cares what a bunch of artists thought was cool a thousand years ago? You do you.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, hey! Do you like to use your a lot?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Doesn't having a machine that makes a breeze on an island in the middle of nowhere seem kindamuch?Not that it would stop me. Honestly, I'm just jealous. Bwa ha ha!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I didn't know you were caring for !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I can't get enough of watching these things. Just five minutes, and all my troublesgo away, .

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Ha! I hope you didn't put this photo of me out just because I'm visiting.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What I mean is, I hope it's ALWAYS thereglaring at you, . Bwa ha ha!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Do you actually still play with your ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />'Cause, I just mean I definitely would, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa, sweet! I love your !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I dig how you make your place feel fun to live in, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I didn't know you had .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Stuff like that really makes a place feel like a home, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />How long did it take you to set up your ?<20_3 arg="3" />Like, how thick was the manual compared tolet's say a copy of ?<20_3 arg="6" />I'm just saying yours is cool and all, but I wouldn't wanna spend a whole day setting mine up, .
